entity.name: dispensary
entity.query: select d.id, d.name, dispensaryURL, street, city, state, zip, phone, email, website, facebookURL, instagramURL, twitterURL, sundayOpen, sundayClose, mondayOpen, mondayClose, tuesdayOpen, tuesdayClose, wednesdayOpen, wednesdayClose, thursdayOpen, thursdayClose, fridayOpen, fridayClose, saturdayOpen, saturdayClose, dispensaryImageURL, lat as lat_coordinate, lang as lan_coordinate from dispensaryentity d
entity.deltaImportQuery: select d.id, d.name, dispensaryURL, street, city, state, zip, phone, email, website, facebookURL, instagramURL, twitterURL, sundayOpen, sundayClose, mondayOpen, mondayClose, tuesdayOpen, tuesdayClose, wednesdayOpen, wednesdayClose, thursdayOpen, thursdayClose, fridayOpen, fridayClose, saturdayOpen, saturdayClose, dispensaryImageURL, lat as lat_coordinate, lang as lang_coordinate from dispensaryentity d where d.id='${dih.delta.id}'
entity.deltaQuery: select id from dispensaryentity where lastUpdateDate > '${dih.last_index_time}'
